templates.template: WITH WTB_LIST AS( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.table_name , T.table_comment , C.column_name , C.column_comment , C.data_type , C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH len , C.NUMERIC_SCALE scale , case when C.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' then 'Y' else 'N' end is_nullable , C.column_default , C.column_type , 1 AS col_cnt , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.column_name ORDER BY IFNULL(C.COLUMN_COMMENT, '') DESC, IFNULL(T.TABLE_COMMENT, '') DESC, T.TABLE_NAME) AS rank01 FROM information_schema.tables t inner join information_schema.columns C on T.TABLE_SCHEMA = C.TABLE_SCHEMA and T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME WHERE T.table_schema = DATABASE() AND T.TABLE_NAME IN (${tables}) AND C.COLUMN_NAME IN (${cols}) ) T WHERE RANK01 = 1 ) SELECT * FROM WTB_LIST UNION ALL SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT T.table_name , T.table_comment , C.column_name , C.COLUMN_COMMENT , C.DATA_TYPE , C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH LEN , C.NUMERIC_SCALE SCALE , case when C.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' then 'Y' else 'N' end IS_NULLABLE , C.column_default , C.column_type , 1 AS col_cnt , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.column_name ORDER BY IFNULL(C.COLUMN_COMMENT, '') DESC, IFNULL(T.TABLE_COMMENT, '') DESC, T.TABLE_NAME) AS RANK01 FROM information_schema.tables t inner join information_schema.columns C on T.TABLE_SCHEMA = C.TABLE_SCHEMA and T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME WHERE T.table_schema = DATABASE() AND C.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM WTB_LIST) AND C.COLUMN_NAME IN (${cols}) ) T WHERE T.RANK01 = 1
